full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement - Building Painting and Wall Covering Services
#### Tender Reference Number: WS4443975801

---

* **Title (English)**: 6D063-234072 - Building Painting and Wall Covering Services
* **Title (French)**: 6D063-234072 - Services de peinture de bâtiment et de revêtement mural

---

### Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date**: 31 May 2024 (14:00 EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 01 July 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 31 March 2026
* **Tender Status**: Expired

---

### Tender Notice

The Department of Public Works and Government Services in partnership with Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) invites eligible contractors to submit a proposal for building painting and wall covering services at PHAC facilities in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

The selected contractor will be responsible for providing skilled licensed labor, tools, equipment, supervision and materials necessary to complete the required works. Work under this contract will include, but not be limited to:

* Building painting services
* Wall covering services
* Provision of necessary and acceptable materials
* Supervision of personnel

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5
* **End User Entity Name**: Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)
* **End User Entity Address**: 130 Colonnade Road, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K9

---

### Contract Requirements

Contractors should submit their proposals electronically via Ariba Discovery, with the closing time referenced above. All bids received after 14:00 EST will be declared non-responsive.

Greek-stylized bilingual contact information for any inquiries can be found below:

* **Contact Person**: Fagan, Mike (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

---

For further information on this tender, please refer to the original announcement document provided above.  Announce someone in the comments section as well if you have any.  Contact me or Anuj?maintaining_girvirajamoney?   separately if you want
